name: Kru Music
description: Music of the Kru peoples indigenous to Liberia and Ivory Coast.

children.name: Alloukou
children.description: Created by the Bété people of Côte d'Ivoire, featuring a distinctive rhythm that uses polyrhythms and triplets.

children.name: Palm Wine Music
children.description: Fusion of the African Folk Music of the region with imported Caribbean Calypso.

children.name: Ziglibithy
children.description: Ivorian mid-1970s dance music created after the country's independence, influenced by post-colonial trends in African Music.
